title: Nintendo Says Its Online Is Not Falling Behind - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.08.19
description:
Get started with the Hims complete hair kit for just $5 today right now at http://forhims.com/GAMESDAILY.

Greg and Tim discuss the Batman Arkham Collection, Nintendo's comments about its online services, the latest PS Plus issues and more. 

Time Stamps - 
00:01:45 - Housekeeping
Thank you to everyone who came to see us at RTX
Critical Role’s Brian W. Foster is on We Have Cool Friends today; on YouTube and podcast services (Spotify is taking its sweet time)
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Colton Yoder, Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:05:33 - Batman: Arkham Collection, Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:07:43 Best Friend Q. - What the hell is up with the leaked Arkham collection? - Jeremy
00:14:47 - Borderlands 3 to have Apex-like Ping System, Hunter Wolfe @ VG247
00:18:34 - Is Nintendo Behind on Online Services? Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:29:15 - Who is to blame for PES and PS Plus? Oscar Dayus @ GameSpot
00:31:25 Best Friend Q. - Should I beat Heavy Rain- DJBradChill
00:34:25 - GuardianCon Brings in $4 Million
00:36:15 - Out today
00:37:54 -  HIMS
Reader mail   -
00:39:32 - When you (insert whoever's on the show today) talk about review scores and Kinda Funny, you talk about needing to create an ethics policy before Kinda Funny gives out scores. What does this entail? How different would Kinda Funny be with an "official" ethics policy? - 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:46:44 - I've been reading articles on the EA Originals programand EA wanting to change the perception that they are evil.What can EA do to change their perception? While I'm sure it's possible, is this something that will take years to change? - BJ Bernardo
00:43:12 - More stories about game studios and developers hiring specific positions for their new games - Borzen00
00:51:48 - Squad Up:Keylocke aka your fighting game connoisseur aka Mikey phillips(PS4) - Keylockemvp
00:53:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host:Tim and Gary
